MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 and KA26 postcode areas of Stranraer and Girvan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.50AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required to equipment on our overhead line network near Castle Kennedy and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 9.37AM on 13 March 2021
